nodes.text: Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars Rebels: Secrets of the Rebels

Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars Rebels: Secrets of the Rebels is a Dorling Kindersley Star Wars Rebels reference title originally conceptualized by Anant Sagar, then written and edited by Gaurav Joshi. It was published in the United States on July 7, 2015.

An action-packed guide to a galactic adventure. DK's Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars Rebels™: Secrets of the Rebels is a fun companion to the first and second season of the new animated television series. The Ultimate Sticker Collection features colorful stickers depicting space battles, vehicles, and characters from the series. Background pages allow children to create their own galactic scenes.
